overview: Using video, 16mm film, installation and photography, Koesterâ€™s work explores those troubled interzones between conscious and unconscious, the occult and the rational. The body and the notion of performance are recurring themes in his work. Koester is a conceptual, experimental artist who dramatizes the human body and creates a language of movement and gestures that evoke questions of trance and possession.
title: Place of Dead Roads
